sqlGroup.sql: select U.username authorname,J.*,R.views,R.comments from users U, discuss J left join discuss_record R on J.id=R.id where U.id=J.author and J.id= ?
select J.*,R.views,R.comments from discuss J left join discuss_record R on J.id=R.id order by J.id asc limit 0,10
